channel.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
channel.description:
The simple 3D polygons are charming but I can't help but want everything drawn by the 2D artist who did the rest of the game.
Great game

item.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
I see the post as “I want more art from the artist that drew the 2D stuff”

Isn’t it sweet? 3:

Pings @Luxx

Read full topic
item.source: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist

item.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
item.dc:creator: hazric
item.description:
I was being intentionally vague.

I would like everything in 2D, but understand a giant rehaul on the art direction wouldn’t be practical.

And who wouldn’t like more 2D art? I think we all agree that despite the different styles from different artists they all still look great together

Read full topic
item.source: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist

item.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I don’t think that’s what is being requested. They just want more art in general not a change in the entire art style

Read full topic
item.source: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist

item.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
I believe it’s impossible to change the art from 3d to 2d at this point.

P.S. as ici said there are more than one artists. Xed (retired), Luxx, Adiart are 2d and Arnenzo 3d if I remember correct.

Read full topic
item.source: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist

item.title: More 2D art by your awesome 2D artist
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
There are actually quite a few 2D artists who did the artwork for the game (can’t quite remember exactly which devs are working on them)

fun fact the Court Wizard and the Sage were drawn by two different people despite how simmilar they look
